titleStmt.title: The observations of Sir Richard Havvkins Knight, in his voiage into the South Sea. Anno Domini 1593
titleStmt.author: Hawkins, Richard, Sir, 1562?-1622.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] D[awson] for Iohn Iaggard, and are to be sold at his shop at the Hand and Starre in Fleete-streete, neere the Temple Gate,
